extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the CVE by retrieving the installed version and configurations of VMware ESXi, VMware Fusion, VMware Workstation, and NSX Data Center for vSphere.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the CVE?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to the security advisories from VMware to download and apply the necessary security patches for the affected products.

affected_products: VMware ESXi versions 7.0 U3 before ESXi70U3c-19193900
VMware ESXi versions 7.0 U2 before ESXi70U2e-19290878
VMware ESXi versions 7.0 U1 before ESXi70U1e-19324898
VMware ESXi versions 6.5 before ESXi650-202202401-SG or ESXi650-202110101-SG
NSX Data Center for vSphere versions before 6.4.13
